summary: NEXUS Chain - Nexus Chain is a next-generation, Ethereum-compatible blockchain designed to offer low, constant gas fees and high throughput, ensuring efficiency and scalability for a wide range of applications. It introduces a unique model allowing users to pay gas fees in standard tokens and incorporates a priority fee mechanism for transaction prioritization. By addressing key limitations of existing blockchains, Nexus Chain aims to facilitate mass adoption of decentralized applications through improved performance, reduced costs, and enhanced user experience.
